title: Very important question for targons blade ( Need help )
body:
Hey so i was having some issues with connecting to the game--- yo targons secretly can we play a normal? I'd love to play with you. My username is ''Defended'' 

Shhh

replies.body:
If you're actually having a hard time connecting to games, I can certainly help, just let me know! ^.^

Maybe we'll run into each other on the rift. I'll be the Leona or Nami going HAM at level 3 in the bot lane. :P

http://imgur.com/a/VwlIn

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=d8yIj20W,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-12T22:40:26.471+0000)
>
> If you're actually having a hard time connecting to games, I can certainly help, just let me know! ^.^
> 
> Maybe we'll run into each other on the rift. I'll be the Leona or Nami going HAM at level 3 in the bot lane. :P
> 
> http://imgur.com/a/VwlIn

No i just really wanted to play a game with ya <.< always see you helping people
